channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
idk if im posting this in the right area so soz if im not
i downloaded moparscape 3.2 w/ aryan and im trying to run it but i cant i start to load and then just stops ive install all the newest jdks and jres ive tried doing that path and class path stuff buy i have no path thing to build of of with this cod ';C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin;." so im lost on what to do please help
And yes im new at java codes so dont be flaming me cuz im new at this
EDIT: i use windows xp hp netbook if that helps

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @hunter_shutdown hunter shutdown
item.description:
@hunter_shutdown wrote:

this is gonna be a little mean but im sorry

I OPEN IT WITH THE .JAR FILE AND IT DOES SAME THINGS I DONT MAKE MISTAKES ON IMPORTANT CRAP LIKE SCRIPTING IF DO IT TELLS US IT CANT FIND PATH C:\PROGRAM FILE\AVA\JDK1.6.0_22\BIN AND THE AVA PART IS THE AKA MISTAKE SO DONT TAKE MY 130+ IQ AND SAY ITS 98 OK OK

so so sorry if thats flaming but it kinda makes me mad when people point out too obvious things
